item.title: How to Get a Web Presence For Your Business
item.description: Starting a new business or moving an existing one online can feel overwhelming with all the options available. Is it really worth the effort? Absolutely! Many business owners will attest to the value of establishing an online presence. But it doesn’t have to be complicated. You can simplify the process by seeking guidance from experienced professionals. Take a look at this engaging introductory video from Network Solutions to see what I mean…

item.title: 1&1 makes 1.99
item.description: Choosing 1&1 for web hosting is like getting a steal of a deal. They’re a leading web hosting company, even internationally recognized, and their starting price is incredibly low at $1.99 per month for the first three months, then $3.99 monthly. You might think this means low quality, but that’s not the case. This entry-level package is comparable to professional hosting services. Here’s what your $1.99 gets you: a free domain name (that you choose!
